bookSourceComment:
なな酱ゃ帮忙正文图片解密
情无羁帮忙解决了正文是图片和纯字的判断if else 
壬二酸于2025.4.1

ruleContent.content: if (src.match(/imlist/)){ var imlist = src.match(/var imlist="([^"]+)"/)[1]; var imgpath = src.match(/var imgpath="([^"]+)"/)[1]; var img = imlist.split(",") .map(function(filename) { return ''; }) .join("\n"); img }else { a=java.getString('class.mcon@tag.p.0@html') }
